storeodr_sum_qty, storeodr.sum_amount storeodr_sum_amount from tranodr a left join lily."user" op on a.op = op.id left join lily."group" ownerGroup on a.gid = ownerGroup.id left join lily."user" ownerUser on a.uid = ownerUser.id left join tranodr prev on a.prev = prev.id left join lily._form form on a.form = form.id left join lily.org shipper on a.shipper = shipper.id left join lily."zone" dst_zone on a.dst_zone = dst_zone.id left join trancat category on a.cat = category.id left join lily."zone" src_zone on a.src_zone = src_zone.id left join saleodr saleodr on a.saleodr = saleodr.id left join tranphase phase on a.phase = phase.id left join storeodr storeodr on a.storeodr = storeodr.id

mapper.insert: insert into tranodr( uid, gid, mode, acl, priority, flags, "state", t0, t1, "year", creation, lastmod, "version", subject, op, text, form, formargs, props, cat, phase, prev, saleodr, storeodr, shipper, src_alias, src_ctprops, src_address1, src_address2, src_zone, src_tel, src_telok, src_email, src_emailok, dst_alias, dst_ctprops, dst_address1, dst_address2, dst_zone, dst_tel, dst_telok, dst_email, dst_emailok, shipcost, "length", sum_qty, sum_amount ) values( #{ownerUserId}, #{ownerGroupId}, #{accessMode}, #{acl}, #{priority}, #{flags}, #{state}, #{beginTime}, #{endTime}, #{year}, #{creationDate}, #{lastModified}, #{version}, #{subject}, #{opId}, #{rawText}, #{formId}, #{formArguments}, #{properties}, #{categoryId}, #{phaseId}, #{prevId}, #{salesOrderId}, #{storeodrId}, #{shipperId}, #{src.alias}, #{src.properties}, #{src.address1}, #{src.address2}, #{src.zoneId}, #{src.tel}, #{src.telValidated}, #{src.email}, #{src.emailValidated}, #{dst.alias}, #{dst.properties}, #{dst.address1}, #{dst.address2}, #{dst.zoneId}, #{dst.tel}, #{dst.telValidated}, #{dst.email}, #{dst.emailValidated}, #{shipcost}, #{length}, #{totalQuantity}, #{totalAmount} );
